title: Understanding Lookup Tables
text: A lookup table is a range of values stored in a separate area of the worksheet. It is used to find corresponding values using lookup functions.

title: What is a Table Array?
text: A table array is a range of cells that contains the data you want to search through using lookup functions like VLOOKUP or HLOOKUP.

title: Identifying the Correct Term
text: Which of the following terms refers to the range of values used in lookup functions?
